content.detailedDescription: I work graveyard shift as a police office. i take my lunch break usually at 0200 hours but sometimes 0300 hours. i also workout at the police gym for my break. i had gone home to get a workout shirt. i pulled up in front of my house and got of my car. when i got out of my car i noticed a bull (not bright) red-orange light moving toward me from the east. the light was low to the ground, a couple hundred feet directly above and slightly to the north. the light went over me and stars behind the light disappeared. the sky was clear and there was no moon that i remember. i could make out an oval to round shape that was completely black with the light close to the middle. the light continued from east to west and disappeared behind some trees. there was absolutely no sound at all but a very slight whisper of wind on my head. the object appeared to be gliding and was not traveling very fast about 50-70 mph. this happened in either july or august of 2013 not sure when exactly
content.summary: Observed a dark outlined object fly over my head, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:45pm my husband and i went outside to have a smoke before heading to bed.  it was a clear december night.  we were only out there about a minute before we noticed what appeared to us to be a single wide mobile home or rectangular shaped house in the field across the street.  this field is totally fenced in and there has been nothing there for several years so we were surprised to see a house.  we hadn't heard anything during the day nor see any movement /trucks bringing in a house.  there appeared to be a door with a window on each side.  lights were on but the house/object appeared to be empty.  
we sat there discussing how odd it was that we never saw it being moved in or how quickly electricity seemed to be hooked up but shook it off and went to bed.
the next morning we got our coffee and went outside to have a smoke and the object was not in the field - there was nothing there.  it was an empty fenced in field as it always was. 
we don't know for sure what it was, but it was very very odd.
to this day every time we drive by we always look at the fencing to see how someone could have pulled in a trailer and there is no way.
content.summary: Object looked like rectangular home in fenced but empty field across the street

content.detailedDescription: This past july, i was on a boy scout trip at shaver lake, ca. about halfway through the trip on a wednesday i believe, at approximately 12:00 midnight, i hopped into a chevy truck bed, and decided to watch the stars. after about 15 minutes, my mind was completely at ease, but was re energized by what looked like a shooting star. almost immediately behind this shooting star, was something i find extremely difficult to put into words, so please bear with me. this is the best description i can put forth: immediately following the shooting star, there was a dark object that seemed to rotate 180 degrees, but as it was rotating, the side that was coming into visibility, was an bright white/orange orb that suddenly shot into hyper space like a star wars ship. this object made absolutely no noise. the first thought that came into my head was, "there was somebody/something operating that". began to feel a little sick due to the fact of the possibility that i might have encountered a living being originating from somewhere else.
content.summary: Came behind a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: Unknowns. was takeing pictures it was not there looked at the pictures and there it was
content.summary: Sight seeing and then we took pictures it was not there we looked at the pictures it was in the pictures

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 6:15 a.M. 09-24-2014 i stepped out the door facing north looked up to see if it was cloudy or not i observed a thin cloud layer whereas i saw an orange object moving from north to south i was immediately intrigued so quickly went into the garage and grabbed a pair of binoculars,by the time i got back outside the object was over head.I quickly focused the binocs on the craft and saw a steady orange craft at least 500 feet long, i saw two red strobe lights at the front and one white strobe at the rear of this craft.I observed no wings and there was no sound.I was in the aircraft manufacturing business as a machinist for well over twenty years and grew up next door to carswell a.F.B in f.W. texas ,i,am well aware of what airplanes look like even in in a thin cloud layer,also an amateur astronomer for over forty years.When the craft got about a mile to the south of my position with unaided eye there was a white flash and it was gone.
content.summary: The object was moving thru a thin layer of clouds , i got binoculars could see outline of craft, no wings saw 2 white strobe lights st front 1 red at rear

content.detailedDescription: This is the first time using a computer so please excuse my mistakes.  a summers evening around 9pm i was with a friend sitting on a hill at a park looking at thestars. we saw 3 bright stars high in the sky over lake erie.They moved in zigzag path, we watched them for about 20 minutes. it was time to head back home. the walk home was through empty streets.This area was full of factory buildings, 5 to 6 storys high. i felt like someone was watching me,i looked up and saw a huge copper color object hovering about 10 feet above the 6 floor building. there was no wind or sound,no odor.There were rectangular windows around it. i tried to see if i could see inside but it was just black inside. im looking at it thinking if they take us up in this my mother is not going to believe me and i will be late getting home. so we started  to run home i had my father come outside to see it. by this time the 3 were high up in the sky over downtown. now they just looked like stars but moving crazy patterns. i have played this over and over in my head and told many people the story. i feel blessed to have seen this
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw 3 bright stars in the sky.They moved zigzag. i started to walk home, over a 5 story building hovered a large saucer shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: While admiring the milky way, a star like light was flashing red and blue lights as an aircraft would,  but the size of a star.  the light source was white between the flashing colors and remained stationary throughout the two hour intermittent observation.  i thought my eyes were playing tricks  so i went outside several times, once with binoculars and it remained the same.  the light stayed about 20 degrees above the horizon, due west from my location.  the weather was clear with no high clouds nor airplanes apparent as their navigation lights are often seen overhead.  atmospheric heat waves sometimes affect star flickering but this was very pronounced flashing red, blue and white colors.  after a busy day i gave up observing the light and went to bed.  my son thought i should report the unusual observation.
content.summary: Star like stationary light with oscillating red, blue and white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a chair opposite my mother and saw a glowing object while glancing through her patio window doors to cloud level. at first i thought it was a reflection from lighting inside her condominium, but realized this was not the case and that it had a density and inner glow.It looked like a piece of thick thread that had been squeezed together and remained in that form, or a bit like intestine. it hung in the sky for almost two minutes before moving backwards very fast. becoming smaller quickly until it reached pinpoint size in the blue sky and then was gone. it was exciting to see, and to see it leave. not something everyone has a chance to witness.
content.summary: Observed object while glancing out window to cloud level.

content.detailedDescription:
She was at a friends house. they were all outside making smores and dancing to music.Her friends sibling was playing a video game and my daughter was singing along to a song as her friend looked inside her garage. my daughter felt a weird need to look up at the night sky for some reason,like she would miss something if she didn't,so she did. a few moments after she looked up she saw a bright blue-white object in the sky. it was really high up in the sky that from were she was it looked really small. the object was only flew for about a second until it stopped flying and just hoverd high up in the sky over her friends house and blinked twice. my daughter was frozen in shock but she managed to touch her friends shoulder as she watched the sky. the object after blinking twice seemed to be brighter and in less then a second was out of sight.Her friend turned around and my daughter turned to face her for a quick second and pointed at the sky and yelled "did anyone see that" she and her sibling both said no and my daughter started to explain what she saw. as she did so, she looked up at the sky  and out of no where they both see the sky where she saw the object turn a bright blue-white color.It blinked about three times then stopped. the sky was back to its dark color and we could see stars again.
for some odd reason my daughters body wouldn't allow her to stop shaking and she was breathing heavy. she felt a strong bad vibe come from the object she saw and it only got stronger when her friend and her saw the sky change color. her friend told her she was shaking really fast and my daughter felt light headed. she told her friend they need to get back inside because she didn't feel safe. her friend agreed and they quickly ran inside where my daughters whole body just relaxed she could breath better and she stopped shaking.
content.summary: My daughter looked up at the sky and saw a strange object flying really fast, then stopped moving then flew again

content.detailedDescription: Opened window at 5:30 to see a weird blinking star, that wasn't a star
content.summary: Opened window at 5:30 to see a weird blinking star, that wasnt a star

content.detailedDescription: On patio having coffee with wife.
content.summary: Hover then track to north

content.detailedDescription: From my driveway, i saw a formation of two sets of 4 orange lights followed by another formation of 3 orange lights, then multiple sets of 2, followed by singles, half a minute to a minute apart. i counted a total of 26 objects. i could not hear any sounds coming from them. when i took a picture of them on my cellphone and zoomed the picture to see better, the lights had a disc-like appearance. i called two of my neighbors and none of us was able to make sense of it.
content.summary: 26 orange lights flying from north and turning west before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Went out on my front porch about 9pm to water mums, looked up at sky because it was such a beautiful clear fall night. i noticed a very bright i thought was a star, changing colors, flashing white to blue to red to orange. i looked around at the sky, saw all the stars i'm familiar with, and constellations. the big dipper, orion all in place. so i figured i'd stick around and watch the flashing object. it was slightly wobbly and moving very slowly at a diagonal lower to the horizon from w/nw to north. there was a tall pine tree in the distance it was behind that for about 4 minutes and i could still see it flashing through the branches. eventually, it went lower than a mountain in the distance and i lost sight of it. the whole sighting was approximately 50 minutes. i'm very oh, and an airplane flew right under it as i was observing it. i'm very familiar with the night sky, stars, and constellations, aircraft, i regularly watch the iss, this was weird! my 9 year old watched with me she was actually freaked out! i tried to take a picture but all i had was my phone it did not come out:(
content.summary: Looked like star but started flashing colors moved slowly

content.detailedDescription:
September 27, 2014, at approximately 10:30pm, son saw a round object
40 degrees from the horizon, low in the sky with rainbow colour
flashing lights. the lights were flashing randomly. it was heading
ne. he was out for a bike ride at the time of the sighting. it was
a very clear night, no light pollution. the sighting left him
startled, unsettled.
content.summary: Son saw a round object low in the sky with rainbow colour lights flashing in a random pattern flying ne

content.detailedDescription: At about 9pm on monday september 22, 2014, my fiancé and i were watching for meteorites in south central ohio when we saw a large object in the sky. it appeared to be constructed of multiple triangular shapes and was glowing very brightly. there were no lights and no sound. it was flying pretty low in a north east direction while heading downward. we were really unsure what we were seeing, but because of the direction it was going, how low it already was, and how big it was, we expected to hear a loud crash; but we never heard anything. it just disappeared.
content.summary: My fiancé and i saw a very large, very bright glowing, object silently heading northeast in a downward direction.  the object appeared to be multiply triangular. the whole sighting was only about 1 minute long.

content.detailedDescription:
Date of event: 27 september 2014
temp:  67 degs
wind: 13 mph
direction: nne
visibility: 10 miles
ceiling clear, no clouds
event began at 10:22 pm ...
bright orb appeared like a pulsating star, approximately 1 miles from this conductors  observation report..
10:30 pm  red light came on for 2 -5 seconds on east side of object.
10:35 brightness same but red light stayed on longer 20-30 seconds. bright brilliant blue ligh appeared for a few seconds.
10:37 object sparkled more acting like it is roating and has changed altitude to another level, because sparkling trailed the object observing a tail sparkling on top of the object for a few seconds.
10:38**  top of the object has been turned on brilliant  light for 5 to 10 seconds<acted to this conductor like an observation deck turned on>, now turned off after  5 to 10 seconds<switched on/off>
10:40 pm object brightness becoming dim
10:45 object has gone, no sign of the object.
patrick m. o'brien/pekin, indiana.
i am a field investigator for mufon  the past few years.
content.summary: Star like object, ne position  very bright, but had bright light turned on upper portion for for 10-15 seconds.

content.detailedDescription: At  630am  9-28-14  while  letting dog out,i witness  a   bright starlike object flash  bright  and  fly very  fast  over  an airplane.It and the airplane  were  heading  southeast  toward  lexington or  bellville  ohio.
content.summary: Flew above  a plane.  bright  flash and sped  southeast

content.detailedDescription:
We were on a trip to boston, and we had parked next to a parking garage. i looked up into the sky and noticed a white dot streaking through the sky. i looked closer and saw it was oval shaped, no bigger than a penny from my view. it was moving probably medium speed from where i saw it, in a perfectly
straight line. i was amazed and surprised from seeing the ufo. it kept getting further and further away and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: I looked up and saw a white oval shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were outside at 5 am. i was waiting for her to walk home from work. while sitting on my porch i noticed a bright white light moving steady and increasingly fast from west to east from horizon line to horizon line over my neighborhood. i told her to look and see if she could see it from where she was and she could see it too. by the time she had gotten home out had been long gone. there was also and amber alert in berlin to the surrounding areas in wisconsin that kept going off on our phones which had originally woke me up. when i saw it i knew it couldn't have been a plane we're both very avid eaa fans and this thing was moving way to fast. a couple seconds later it was also followed by a satellite following almost the exact same flight path at not even a quarter of the speed. i checked nasas flight plan schedule because i knew there was a launch coming up but the launch isn't scheduled until tuesday later this week. i'd anyone can better explain what we saw please contact me. i'd love to discuss this further. thank you.
content.summary: Bright ball of light moving quickly from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
I was stargazing on the shore of wilson like in wilton maine (beautiful spot with an incredible view of the sky). i had been there for about 45 minutes and had seen a few meteors but nothing out of the ordinary. i suddenly felt a heaviness pressing down on my head and shoulders. i thought i must just be tired and didn't think much of it in the moment, and it's possibly unrelated even if i did see genuine ufos, but i will include that for thoroughness. 

looking north, in the far distance, at first i thought they were just stars, but then i noticed two of them moving in unison. their speed and direction were perfectly in synch. they were moving west to east in the northern sky, but their altitude was dropping slightly. a few minutes after i saw them they dropped below the tree line. if i had to guess i'd say they were maybe 40 miles to the north but i really have no way to know for sure.

i have been an observer of the night sky for a long time. i know what satellites look like. i know what planes look like. i know what helicopters look like. i know what the iss looks like and when it is supposed to pass over. this was not any of those. if the objects were stationary i would have thought they were stars. but they were moving, in unison, and they were too far apart to be lights on the same craft. this is the first time in my entire life that i haven't been able to be sure of what i saw in the sky.
content.summary: Two lights moving in unison across the northern sky. not satellites, not planes.. 2 lights, same speed, same direction.

content.detailedDescription: I better do not tell what i was doing at that exact moment. you just need to know that i was left alone for a second in the bedroom, i put my attention to the birds outside the window that were actually very active and this is exactly when i saw. my husband came back a few minutes later and almost die of frustration for missing the opportunity to see it. the object--disc form--just appeared all of the sudden flying sideways in a almost straight path. it gave the impression that it was descending but just disappeared behind the housing line and couldn't see any further where it went. i believe in ufos but i am usually skeptic when it comes to recognize that it was indeed one i saw. but there was no logic explanation coming to my mind that could explain the size, the height, and the form of flight almost describing a long open downward parabolic trajectory. i do not know if i had any particular feeling other than i felt shocked for a moment since my mind couldn't grasp what was it within known parameters. i tried to forget it thinking it was something else but the more i thought about it, the more i came to realize that i probably saw an ufo.
content.summary: Ufo- disc flying sideways, solid lead/gray color in downtown rodeo, ca flying almost parallel to parker ave.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to purchase a motor from jdm engine depot.
684 schuyler ave. bldg#27a, kearny nj 07032. i arrived by 09:30. i did not see any lights or image. went inside at 10:00 purchased the motor and by 10:30 i got back in my vehicle. i started to see a light to my left. i took the video and some pictures at 10:43 am. it was small and hovered than it moved in a strange way. that's what grabbed my attention. it was a small sphere and glowing very brightly. the ufo changed shape very quickly.
never seen anything like it. i have never reported or encountered something i cannot explain.

i have one video and 2 pics. i will call to send directly to an email.

thank you.
content.summary: Bright light, hovering and also moving erratically

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was on back deck taking dogs out at 9:30 pm on 9/26/2014 (saturday). he called to me to come out as he had seen what appeared to be an explosion.  i saw sparks appear to fall from the craft which was steadily traveling from north to northwest.  he said it appeared that the object exploded and was on fire and sparks fell towards the ground.  
the object never stopped or moved quickly, but steadily continued on its path.  it eventually disappeared into the northwest area of the sky away from our house. as the object moved northwest, i saw occasional flashes as though there were more explosions and then the craft would black out and i would see nothing but it never slowed its path. 

there was no noise with this event.  

thought it may have been a plane/aircraft in trouble, but it never stopped, or came to the ground. 

there were sparks that dropped from this craft, which appeared to be round or cylindrical.  the sparks were orange to my husband but to me, the color appeared redder. i also saw some flames/sparks drop from this object.  it continued to move in a slow steady and brisk pace to the northwest and eventually dropped out of sight.  as it was moving away, the lights/sparks would disappear and then in a few seconds later, you would see a flash and it would again appear to die out.  it eventually flew to the northwest and out of sight and never appeared to fall to the ground.  

we watched the news but there was nothing mentioned.
content.summary: Appeared to be an explosion in a small craft in sky 9/26/14 over parker, co

content.detailedDescription: I was just in the yard (right on a lake 10 miles west of phillips wi)enjoying a nice fire. clear skies, no moon, dead quiet, and then three bright orange lights travelling in a line from south to north. first thought was military aircraft. then, as each passed overhead, their lights would slowly dim and then disappear. two minutes later, a fourth light followed, easily twice as bright as the others.  based on their speed, i would guess they were travelling at 20,000' or so. what troubles me is this. there was no noise, and there were no strobes, beacons or navigation lights. not normal, by any standards.  i should have heard something.
content.summary: 3 silent orange lights travelling north, followed within a minute or two by a 4th

content.detailedDescription: Neighbor having a party, i looked out of his door from his garage that leads to his back yard.  3 orange/white lights in a triangle formation rotating counter clockwise were noted.  i had 2 other neighbors witness as well.  no sound noted, the object or objects were just above the tree line.  suddenly the lights began to move to the west and then all 3 lights went out. after the lights were not visible, there was 1 light that came into view, almost as it were to trail the previous object or objects.
content.summary: Seen by 2 other neighbors with me

content.detailedDescription:
I happened to look out my window after putting my children to bed & observed two unwavering orange lights in a vertical line with a faint green glow on the right tip (appeared left to me as i was viewing it from ground) of an apparently triangular craft, moving at a steady pace from nw to se toward crane naval base in in (the closest military base to me that i could locate, being near peoria il).  no sound at all. none.  i attempted to view it from my oldest child's window immediately after sighting it, because it faces se, but cloud cover prevented any further view. at first i thought it to be an airplane, but no airplanes fly without the flashing red-&-greens; this had no flashing lights at all, and the green on the right tip appeared very faintly, like an aurora. at first i was fascinated, then i began to feel nervous, and now i feel quite alarmed.
it seemed to me that it was quite low-flying; either that, or it was high up and massive.  i noticed no chase craft after it, just normal air traffic headed ne about 5 min. later.

this is the second strange craft i have seen from my home, the first being a boomerang-shaped dull black craft in broad daylight in mar. 2010, which after viewing for approximately 5 minutes appeared to vanish into the clear blue sky as i watched.
content.summary: Two unblinking orange lights in a parallel line with a faint green glow on right tip of triangle;  sw direction toward crane nb @ steady constant speed.

content.detailedDescription: was sitting outside and i seen a bright blue/white light hovering then it dissapeared/flew away . i thought the object was a ufo because it was not a airplane because airplane have blinking white/red lights and they don't dissapear .
content.summary: I was sitting outside and i seen a bright white/blue light hovering then it flew away/dissapered

content.detailedDescription: Came out for a smoke, looked up and saw a red "ball" in the sky...It was wicked bright at first, but then i almost felt like it knew we were watching it because as soon as we started talking it it started to fade away into nothing!It wasn't the first time that we've seen something special in the sky over holyoke.
content.summary: Red ball in sky

content.detailedDescription: My father and i were on our way back from fishing heading towards a local caravan park which is situated on the n.East coast of whitely bay.To the right of the park is a farmers field with a ploughed field and some woodland.As we made toward the park my father said what,s going on in the woods as there we could see lots of white lights moving around.  i replied to my father looks like theres people around checking things.As we drew nearer the lights appeared to raise up from behind the trees but bow white and blue flashing.My father kept asking what do you think it is?I said its an aeroplane just took off but my father saw an entirely different object to what  i thought which i questioned.I said what do you see...He replied it,s like something out of flash gordon look at the lights all over it!We approached a bend in the road and the object moved outward toward sea while passing over the trees at roughly 5 to 10 mph....My father said it looks like its stopping or going to land on the main road.As we neared the main road which is beside a local land mark called st.Marys lighthouse we turned and saw to our disbelief what i saw was an aeroplane hovering above the houses but what was strange it seemed to have landed.I was driving very slow lookin up at the craft and wanted to stop but my father said whatever you do dont stop theres something weird going on.I remember a car passing us but not making a sound or stopping or even where it  had gone.Everything seemed to be happening in slow motion.Alll around there was silence and nobody around.I  passed below the craft and saw wht appeared to be a doorway with stairs leading from it..My father said keep going dont stop as i nearly mounted a kerb.The craft had blue and white lightes on its wings which were flashing in sequence ,they were very bright and seemed to be signaling out to sea.As we were driving away i said to my dad i wander what this woman is doing walking down the middle of the road.Also do you realise theres no one around or any sign of life.The figure approaching appeared to be a woman but like a dark sillohette.We kept on driving not looking back or noticing where she had gone....We got home explaining what we had just seen to family members and our thoughts and asked if anything had beeen on news but there was nothing nothing on radio as far as i know. my father still says he saw something completely different to what i thought which is very strange on my behalf and to which neither of has any explanation.There is one thing to add and that is i saw the same thing again but at a different time with another person.This event took place at exactly the same location in broad day light.......These events actually happened to me.
content.summary: Lights behind trees,moving around then seemingly taking off.Became shape of aeroplane.I followed road and passed under neath the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night, 9/26/14, about 9:30pm i was driving home with a friend and saw what looked, at first, to be a helicopter not too far distant. this was in brazil, indiana, about midway between indianapolis and terre haute. a search light also appeared to be on. no other light, which is no surprise due to the glare of the bright white front light which seemed to be directed to the highway. getting closer, out of direct line of the white light, i finally saw green light on one side. assuming the white light was in front, that would be the correct position for green light on aircraft. this, however, had 5 green lights along the side. i know of no u.S. aircraft with more position lights than one green on the right and one red on the left of the craft. driving in traffic with the windows up--it was getting cool--it was impossible to listen for sound.

this area is no stranger to either civilian or military aircraft. it was the multiple green lights on the side that seemed strange to me. never saw that before.

approximate location of object: 39.529417, -87.098763 (supplied by google maps)

i was driving east on us hwy 40
content.summary: Multiple lights on object
